name: Octolane AI
headline: Building AI-first Salesforce
description: Building AI-first Salesforce. Our CRM does a lot more than just storing customer data. It uses AI to find the best customers, reach out to them and close them.

founders.name: One Chowdhury, Founder
founders.description: One's first startup was acquired in his freshman year. During this time, he grew the traffic from 0 to over 300K per month and gained 6,000+ registered users. He built search analytics, AI recommendation and a GPT4 powered doc search from design to ship at Mintlify (YC W22) as their first intern. He shares his journey as a founder on Twitter - "Coffee with One". Currently, One is developing Octolane AI (YC W24), an AI Sales CRM designed to autonomously find customers and book demo calls at scale

founders.name: Md Abdul Halim Rafi, Founder
founders.description: Rafi's first company was acquired in 2022, where he grew it to 300,000 monthly visitors and 6,000 users. He built a B2B platform used by over 5,000 brands. Currently, Rafi is building the AI Sales CRM, Octolane AI (YC W24), designed to autonomously find customers and book demo calls at scale.

Perfect playlist for late night coding sessions
![Picture of a party with confetti](https://www.octolane.com/_next/image?url=%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Fbatch.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Our YC W24 batch is the best batch!
## Our Vision
Every other CRM on the market previously built a **system of records** , that changes now. Instead of a system of records, now it’s possible to build a **system of actions** thanks to AI.
Octolane is building AI-first Salesforce. Our software does a lot more than just storing customer data. It predicts your next actions and takes care of that for you. It uses AI to find the best customers, does lead scoring, reaches out to them and closes them. You can also generate any forecasts or reports from thousands of data points with one click or natural language command. You can communicate with hundreds of customers at the same time and predict their next actions.
Customers are switching from HubSpot to us after spending thousands of dollars on their implementation.
We are using AI to automate writing many of the integrations that keep customers locked into Salesforce and then we are going to take all of their customers too. Killing Salesforce is a $300 billion market cap opportunity that is just waiting for someone to finally grab it.
Also, no one works at Salesforce office after 4pm and I am here at our office on a Saturday afternoon on boarding a series B customer while fixing our scalability issues and my co-founder is not gonna sleep until we fix every single GitHub issues. I asked him to go to sleep because he is tired, but he is just not gonna do it. He is built different.
Why?
Because we don’t have enough. Our dream companies are still their clients. My co-founder and I are best friends for 10+ years and we are first generation immigrant. I dropped out of Duke from a full scholarship program to do things that seems impossible and to help others.
Today, at this very moment, we are going through once in a lifetime opportunity and the industry is moving faster than we can possibly imagine.
Who wouldn’t jump on this rocket ship?
– Octolane Team
[View Open Roles](https://www.octolane.com/<https:/app.withrapha.com/job/369?r=ddca0a9f-d55f-4b64-9075-971e44dfcb18>)
Email our team for early access to one@octolane.com
“You need three things to create a successful startup: to start with good people, to make something customers actually want, and to spend as little money as possible.” ― Paul Graham
Backed by · Y Combinator

generated_description:
### Octolane AI: Building the Future of CRM

#### Overview
Founded in 2024 and based in the tech hub of San Francisco, Octolane AI is on a mission to revolutionize customer relationship management. Part of Y Combinator’s W24 batch, this sprightly startup aims to create an "AI-first Salesforce." What does that mean? Simply put, they’re redefining the CRM landscape from a system of records to a system of actions—where AI takes the reins in predicting customer engagement and automating actions that bring in revenue.

#### What They Do
Octolane AI’s software is more than just a data repository; it harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to identify promising customers, initiate outreach, and facilitate conversions. By employing advanced algorithms, it offers not just lead scoring but also automated communication with clients, generating forecasts and reports through simple commands. Think of it as having a smart assistant who knows what steps to take next in your sales cycle.

Their approach is already attracting attention, with many businesses shifting from platforms like HubSpot after costly implementations, showcasing that Octolane delivers value in a streamlined package. The potential to disrupt established giants like Salesforce—a market cap worth $300 billion—is evident and aligns perfectly with their ambitious plans.

#### The Team & Culture
With a core team of just 8 dedicated employees, Octolane AI reflects the grit and passion typical of early-stage startups. Harj Taggar, their Group Partner, adds invaluable experience from his previous ventures. The founders share a deep-rooted friendship, having known each other for over a decade and share the ambition that comes from being first-generation immigrants. Their journey is a testament to resilience and an eagerness to take risks in pursuit of innovation.

The team is noted for its tireless work ethic—they're not clocking out at 4 PM like many in the industry. Instead, they’re committed to scaling their product and supporting their customers even on weekends. It’s this kind of mentality that creates a palpable excitement around Octolane as they're riding the wave of a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the AI market.

#### Why It Matters
In a world where businesses are inundated with data yet often paralyzed by it, Octolane AI represents a break from the norm. They’re not just selling software; they're selling the possibility of a more efficient, action-oriented approach to sales management. If they succeed, they won’t just influence how companies interact with their customer base—they’ll redefine the entire CRM landscape.

For those interested in exploring this promise, Octolane AI invites you to [book a demo](https://www.octolane.com/</>) and see how AI can transform your approach to customer relationships.

### Conclusion
Octolane AI is not just another startup; it's a potential game-changer in the realm of CRM powered by AI. Their vision, coupled with a driven team and an innovative product, positions them to lead a paradigm shift in how businesses engage with customers. With a clear focus on creating value and reducing friction in customer interactions, they just might succeed in toppling the giants.

For more insights and updates, you can visit their [website](https://www.octolane.com) or connect via [Twitter](https://twitter.com/octolane_ai) and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/octolane).
